translation.en: It all started 27 years ago.
translation.zh: 故事要从27年前讲起

translation.en: That's an orphanage.
translation.zh: 那是座孤儿院

translation.en: That's me in the basket. I guess somebody didn't want me.
translation.zh:
篮子里的就是我
我猜 有人不想要我

translation.en: I hear they did want the basket back, though.
translation.zh:
听人讲 我父母甚至还想
把篮子要回去

translation.en: But it was fine in the orphanage.
translation.zh: 但孤儿院里的生活很好

translation.en: That's me in the third row.
translation.zh: 第三排的那个就是我

translation.en: I wasn't very popular.
translation.zh: 我不怎么受欢迎

translation.en: Of course, everybody wanted to be adopted.
translation.zh: 当然了 人人都想被领养

translation.en: Luckily, lots of families came.
translation.zh: 幸运的是 来了很多户人家

translation.en: And everybody got to go live with a family.
translation.zh: 人人都去和家人一起生活了

translation.en: Oh, except me.
translation.zh: 哦 我是个例外

translation.en: But I tried not to give up hope.
translation.zh: 但我努力不放弃希望

translation.en: Then, one day,
translation.zh: 后来 有一天

translation.en: something magical happened, just like out of a fairy tale.
translation.zh:
神奇的事情发生了
就好像是童话

translation.en: Do you remember the one where the wolf huffed and puffed
translation.zh:
你还记得那个故事吗
大灰狼吹啊吹

translation.en: and blew the piggies' house down?
translation.zh: 吹倒小猪房子？

translation.en: And he was wearing a glass slipper, and he had a pumpkin?
translation.zh:
他穿着一只玻璃拖鞋
我想 他还带着一只南瓜？

translation.en: Plus there was that other thing? Well, the same thing happened to me,
translation.zh: 还有什么东西来着？ 嗯 反正同样的事情发生在我身上

translation.en: only vastly different.
translation.zh: 只是极大的不同

translation.en: I changed.
translation.zh: 我变了

translation.en: And the next thing you know, people seemed to like me for once.
translation.zh: 转眼之间 人们似乎立刻喜欢我了 糖豆县选美大赛

translation.en: Then pictures were taken, and suddenly I found the family I always wanted.
translation.zh:
后来 给我照了相片
突然间我有了家 这是我一直想要的

translation.en: Oh, I forgot to tell you, my name is Shelley.
translation.zh: 甜蜜的家 哦 我忘了告诉你 我的名字叫谢丽

translation.en: Now I live in the Playboy Mansion.
translation.zh: 现在我住在花花公子豪宅里

translation.en: And this is where I want to live happily ever after.
translation.zh: 我希望在这里 我能幸福地生活到永远

translation.en: -Throw the ball to me, Kim. -Oh, nice catch. Awesome throw.
translation.zh:
-把球扔给我 金姆
-哦 好球 投得太棒了

translation.en: -Hey, Lauren. -Hi, Shelley!
translation.zh:
-嗨 劳伦
-嗨 谢丽！

translation.en: Hi, Hef! Hi, girls!
translation.zh: 嗨 赫夫！嗨 姑娘们！

translation.en: Hi, Shelley. Looking good.
translation.zh: 嗨 谢丽 你看上去很漂亮

translation.en: -Marvin! -Oh, hey, Shelley.
translation.zh:
-马文！
-哦 嗨 谢丽

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: You guys have to try one of these. Marvin makes the best margaritas.
translation.zh:
你们都要试试这些
马文能调制最好的马格丽特酒

translation.en: That's 'cause they're mangoritas. I invented them myself.
translation.zh:
那是因为这是芒果丽特酒
我自己发明的

translation.en: I added my own little Marvin twist to them.
translation.zh: 我还往里面加入了马文秘方

translation.en: Well, you're the best twister I know.
translation.zh: 嗯 你就是我认识的最有秘方的人

translation.en: Shelley, you're the best twister.
translation.zh: 不 谢丽 你才是呢

translation.en: -Shelley. -Hi!
translation.zh:
-谢丽
-你好！

translation.en: Why are you keeping the rich, good-looking, famous guys to yourself?
translation.zh:
你为什么要把那些有财有貌
又有名的家伙全部据为己有呢？

translation.en: -You should introduce me. -Of course.
translation.zh:
-你应该介绍我
-哦 当然

translation.en: This is Cassandra. Only been here a few months,
translation.zh:
各位 这是卡桑德拉
她刚来这里几个月

translation.en: but everybody loves her, because she's super-beautiful
translation.zh: 但人人喜欢她 因为她超级美丽

translation.en: and she never throws up on anybody when she's drunk.
translation.zh: 她喝醉酒从来没吐到别人身上

translation.en: So, Shelley, are you a centerfold?
translation.zh: 那么 谢丽 你是夹页女郎吗？

translation.en: She wishes.
translation.zh: 那是她的梦想

translation.en: Yeah, I do. So keep all your fingers crossed.
translation.zh: 对 我想啊 你们也要为我祈祷耶

translation.en: Hopefully Hef'll give me the good news this weekend at my birthday party.
translation.zh:
希望这个周末我的生日聚会上
赫夫会给我带来好消息

translation.en: I've got my "turn ons" all ready and everything.
translation.zh: 我的兴奋劲儿已经调动起来了

translation.en: Being a centerfold is the highest, most prestigious honor there is.
translation.zh: 当夹页女郎可是至高无上的荣耀

translation.en: It says, "I'm naked in the middle of a magazine.
translation.zh:
就像是在说
〝我裸体站在杂志中央

translation.en: "Unfold me."
translation.zh: 打开我〞

translation.en: I gotta tell you, it seems you've got a pretty good life here.
translation.zh:
我要告诉你
似乎我在这里的生活不错

translation.en: Oh, it's paradise.
translation.zh: 哦 这就是天堂

translation.en: We are just one big family. I am so happy.
translation.zh: 我们就像一个大家庭 我真高兴

translation.en: Why would I wanna live anywhere else?
translation.zh: 为什么我还要去别处住呢？

translation.en: I love this one. Don't you guys?
translation.zh: 我喜欢这里 你们大家呢？

translation.en: We'll put this on the Mansion tab and have it all sent over this afternoon.
translation.zh:
我们会把这个记到豪宅帐上
然后今天下午派人送过来

translation.en: Aren't we just the luckiest girls in the whole world?
translation.zh: 我们可算是世界上最幸运的女孩了吧？

translation.en: Yes, you are.
translation.zh: 对 是啊

translation.en: Your birthday party on Friday's gonna be so fun!
translation.zh: 你星期五的生日聚会一定会很好玩！

translation.en: Shelley!
translation.zh: 谢丽！

translation.en: Oh, my God. I bet you're gonna get Miss November.
translation.zh:
哦 我的天
我打赌你要成为十一月小姐了

translation.en: Good morning, Shelley.
translation.zh: 早上好 谢丽

translation.en: Rise and shine, sweetheart.
translation.zh: 早起精神好 小甜心

translation.en: Good morning, Marvin.
translation.zh: 早上好 马文

translation.en: Good morning, Pooter. You're looking dapper.
translation.zh:
早上好 普特
你看上去真帅

translation.en: Your blueberry French toast is ready.
translation.zh: 你的蓝莓法式土司好了

translation.en: -That's French, right? -Yeah, but more important than food,
translation.zh: 那是法语吧？ 对 但比食物更重要的

translation.en: I added something to your orange juice.

translation.en: Oh, Marvin, thank you so much for telling me.
translation.zh: 哦 马文 谢谢你告诉我

translation.en: Usually I don't find out until much later.

translation.en: Oh, no. To add zest to the drink, first I put in some vanilla extract,
translation.zh:
哦 不 要给饮料加些精华
首先我要放进些香草精

translation.en: then, of course, some egg yolks, and then, I have a secret ingredient.
translation.zh:
然后 当然了 一些蛋黄
然后 我加了一种秘密成分

translation.en: All right, you twisted my arm, it's chili powder.
translation.zh: 好了 你别逼我了 是辣椒面

translation.en: Yeah. It just explodes your taste buds, so the drink just envelops your mouth.
translation.zh:
对 这会让你的味蕾爆炸
饮料就会封住你的小嘴

translation.en: Oh, I love having my mouth enveloped.
translation.zh: 哦 我喜欢把嘴封住

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: Is this from Hef? Is this my birthday gift?
translation.zh: 是赫夫写来的？是我的生日礼物吗？

translation.en: Oh, Pooter, is it finally happening? Am I Miss November?
translation.zh:
哦 普特 美梦成真了吗？
我是十一月小姐？

translation.en: That's what I wished for when I blew out my candle.
translation.zh: 我吹蜡烛的时候就是这么许的愿

translation.en: I just told you my wish. Now it won't come true.
translation.zh:
哦 我的天 我把许的愿告诉你了
现在 这愿望不会实现了

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I didn't mean to, it just came out.
translation.zh:
对不起
我不想说 但是不小心透露了

translation.en: My teeth couldn't stop it.
translation.zh: 我的牙齿没挡住

translation.en: I take it all back, I take it all back.
translation.zh: 我全部收回

translation.en: Okay, I'm ready.
translation.zh: 好吧 我准备好了

translation.en: "Dear Shelley..." Oh, my gosh, that's me.
translation.zh: 〝亲爱的谢丽...〝哦 我的天 是我

translation.en: Wait, there's more.
translation.zh: 等等 还有呢

translation.en: "Please move out of the Mansion immediately."
translation.zh: 〝请立即搬出豪宅〞

translation.en: Move out?
translation.zh: 搬出去？

translation.en: "You have two hours to collect your belongings and leave the premises.
translation.zh: 〝你有两小时收拾行李离开本宅

translation.en: All my love, Hef."
translation.zh: 我所有的爱 赫夫〞

translation.en: Hef's kicking me out?
translation.zh: 赫夫要把我踢出去？

translation.en: Why would he do that?
translation.zh: 他为什么那么做？

translation.en: This is my home. This is my family.
translation.zh: 这是我的家 我的家人

translation.en: I hate to say this, Shelley, but maybe it's because of your age.
translation.zh:
我不想说这个 谢丽
但也许是因为你的年龄

translation.en: But I'm 27.
translation.zh: 但我才27岁

translation.en: Yeah, but that's 59 in Bunny years.
translation.zh:
对 但在兔女郎的世界里
这相当于59岁

translation.en: But I just turned 27 last night.
translation.zh: 但我昨天晚上才到27岁

translation.en: It's almost like I'm still 26.
translation.zh: 我几乎就像还是26岁

translation.en: Or 58.
translation.zh: 或者说 58岁

translation.en: I've gotta talk to Hef, maybe he'll let me stay.
translation.zh: 我要和赫夫谈谈 也许他会让我留下来

translation.en: Hef!
translation.zh: 赫夫！

translation.en: Hef!
translation.zh: 赫夫！

translation.en: Hef!
translation.zh: 赫夫！

translation.en: Hef?
translation.zh: 赫夫！

translation.en: Where is he?
translation.zh: 他在哪儿？

translation.en: He left for Vegas, Shelley. I don't think he's that good with goodbyes.

他去拉斯维加斯了 谢丽
我想他不擅长和人告别

translation.en: Why is this all happening?
translation.zh: 为什么会发生这些事？

translation.en: Where's my pink Prius?
translation.zh: 我的粉色丰田普利斯哪儿去了？

translation.en: The Prius actually belongs to the company. This is the car you came here with.
translation.zh:
普利斯是属于公司的
这是你来这里的时候开的车

translation.en: But...
translation.zh: 但是...

translation.en: Come on, Pooter.
translation.zh: 走吧 普特

translation.en: We have to go find a new place to live.
translation.zh: 我们要找个新的地方住

translation.en: Come on, now.
translation.zh: 现在走吧

translation.en: Come here, Pooter.
translation.zh: 到这儿来 普特

translation.en: Let me help, Shelley. Hey, Pooter. Shelley's calling you.
translation.zh:
让我来帮你 谢丽 嗨 普特
谢丽在叫你

translation.en: Come on, Pooter. Go with Shelley, buddy. Pooter!
translation.zh:
来吧 普特
和谢丽一起走 好朋友 普特！

translation.en: That hurts! Go with Shelley, Pooter!
translation.zh: 现在走吧

translation.en: Damn it!
translation.zh: 可恶！

translation.en: Why don't I just keep him here for a little while, until he calms down?
translation.zh:
为什么我不能让他在这儿待一会儿
让他冷静下来呢？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Well, don't worry, Pooter.
translation.zh: 嗯 别担心 普特

translation.en: I'm gonna find us a really nice place to live,
translation.zh: 我会给我们找个好地方住

translation.en: and then maybe you'll wanna come live with me.
translation.zh: 也许你会愿意和我住

translation.en: I'm sure he will.
translation.zh: 我相信他会的

translation.en: Well, you take care, Shelley.
translation.zh: 嗯 你保重 谢丽

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: I know it's an embarrassment to live in a beat-up car,
translation.zh: 我知道住在一辆破车里很丢脸

translation.en: but don't lose faith, Pooter. I'm gonna get a great job soon,

translation.en: and find us a super place to live, with a new family.

给我们找个特别好的地方住
有新的家人

translation.en: I pinkie promise, Pooter.
translation.zh: 这是我的粉色承诺 普特

translation.en: Good evening, ma'am.
translation.zh: 晚上好 夫人

translation.en: You violated Code 753. That's unlawful spitting.
translation.zh: 你违反了753条 非法吐痰

translation.en: -I was just brushing my teeth. -You currently residing in this car?
translation.zh: 我只是刷牙啊 你现在住在这辆车里 对吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna have to issue another ticket.
translation.zh: 我要给你再开多张罚单

translation.en: Would you maybe stop giving me tickets if I said I was having a really bad week

我这周糟糕透顶了
你也许可以不罚我了

translation.en: because I used to be a Playboy Bunny,
translation.zh:
因为我以前是《花花公子》的兔女郎
但我被踢出了豪宅

translation.en: but I got kicked out of the Mansion because I'm 59 years old?

translation.en: I'm gonna have to ask you to step out of the car and take a Breathalyzer.
translation.zh:
我要请你站到车外
测一下你的酒精含量

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Noises.
translation.zh: 噪音

translation.en: I'm gonna need you to blow on this.
translation.zh: 请你吹这个

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: I guess.
translation.zh: 我猜

translation.en: You tried to do what?
translation.zh: 你想这么做？

translation.en: To a cop?
translation.zh: 给一个警察

translation.en: Stupid!
translation.zh: 真傻！

translation.en: I was just doing what he said.
translation.zh: 我就做了他让我做的事

translation.en: He was in a uniform and everything.
translation.zh: 他穿着制服什么的

translation.en: Don't worry, first-timers only get one night.
translation.zh:
别担心 小甜甜
初犯只关一晚上

translation.en: You'll be back on the street selling in no time.
translation.zh: 你很快就可以回到街上卖春了

translation.en: But I'm not a prostitute. I was just brushing my teeth.
translation.zh:
但我不是妓女
我只是在刷牙

translation.en: I like your tights.

translation.en: And, you know, you should really go for a more natural look.
translation.zh: 你知道 你真应该化更自然的妆

translation.en: All that heavy makeup just hides your beauty.

translation.en: I'm a dude.

translation.en: Oh, well, you're good like that.

translation.en: -You hear about the party at Jordan's? -It was unbelievable.

translation.en: -Oh, last Saturday? -Yes.

-哦 上星期六？
-对

translation.en: -He makes the best margaritas. -It's because he uses mangos.
translation.zh:
-哦 我的天 他配马格丽特酒最好了
-对 因为他用芒果

translation.en: -Really? -He read about them.
translation.zh:
-不 真的？
-他从什么地方读到的

translation.en: -Yeah, mangoritas. -Jordan's just so hot.
translation.zh:
对 芒果丽塔 -约顿真火辣
-我知道

translation.en: I know. So are all his friends.
translation.zh:
-约顿真火辣
-我知道 他所有那些朋友也火辣

translation.en: Yeah, seriously, I've tried to hook up with all of them.
translation.zh: 真的 每个人我都想泡

translation.en: -No, you have not. -Yes. Yes, I did.
translation.zh:
-不 你不会吧
-真的 我就是那样的

translation.en: Two of them, I succeeded.
translation.zh: 其中两个 我成功钓到了

translation.en: -Really? -It was amazing.
translation.zh:
-真的？
-太爽了

translation.en: Who knew?
translation.zh: 谁知道呢？

translation.en: I was so excited.
translation.zh: 我太兴奋了

translation.en: Looks like a mini-Playboy Mansion.
translation.zh: 看上去像个微型花花公子豪宅

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
translation.zh:
-嗨
-嗨

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Can I help you?
translation.zh: 我能帮你什么？

translation.en: Yes. I would like to live here, please.
translation.zh: 对 我想住在这里

translation.en: Oh, I know, right? But you have to be asked to live here.
translation.zh:
哦 我知道了 好吗？
但你必须受到邀请才能来住

translation.en: -Do you go to this school? -This is a school?
translation.zh:
-你在这所学校上学吗？
-这是所学校？

translation.en: Where are the desks?

translation.en: No. This is a sorority house at a school.
translation.zh: 不 这是学校姊妹会的宿舍

translation.en: And you do look like an older,
translation.zh: 你的确看上去大一些

translation.en: sluttier version of the type of girl we would want.

translation.en: But, I'm sorry, you're not a student. It was so nice talking to you.
translation.zh:
但是 对不起 你不是学生
很高兴和你谈话

translation.en: -But I really think it's-- -So nice.
translation.zh:
-但我真的...
-很高兴

translation.en: And our piano is from Tuscany. Very high-end.
translation.zh:
我们的钢琴是意大利产的
很高级

translation.en: I believe that every detail of the house
translation.zh: 我相信房子的每个细节

translation.en: should be a reflection of the girls who live here.
translation.zh: 都应该是住在里面姑娘的反映

translation.en: Hi. Do you ladies go to school here too?
translation.zh: 嗨 你们这些女士们也在这里上学吗？

translation.en: Not anymore.
translation.zh: 不上了

translation.en: We're the housemothers of the sororities on campus.

translation.en: That's so dope.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: Do you live in the houses with the girls?

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: That's even dopier.
translation.zh: 更棒了

translation.en: So, what do housemothers do?
translation.zh: 那么 舍监做什么？

translation.en: We oversee the meal plans,
translation.zh: 我们监督饮食计划

translation.en: chaperone social events, keep the girls stay out of trouble.

陪同参加社交活动
保证姑娘们不出问题

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. That's exactly what I used to do back at the Mansion.

哦 我的天 这正是
我在豪宅里所做的事

translation.en: Can I be one too?

translation.en: I'm looking to be like you.
translation.zh: 我想像你们这样

translation.en: I wanna be a housemother.
translation.zh: 我想当舍监

translation.en: We have standards.
translation.zh: 我们有标准的

translation.en: Standards that you clearly do not meet. But it was nice to meet you.
translation.zh:
你显然不符合标准
但很高兴见到你

translation.en: But I just want to--
translation.zh: 但我只是想...

translation.en: -So nice. -So nice.
translation.zh:
-真好
-真好

translation.en: Try Zeta. Their last housemother was hospitalized with hallucinations.
translation.zh:
试试泽塔 她们上一个舍监
因为出现幻觉住院了

translation.en: Awesome.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: Awesome.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.zh: 我还是饿 虽然我们刚刚吃过饭了

translation.en: Oh, my gosh, I can't believe I did that.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天 不敢相信我那么做

translation.en: -Sorry, let me take care of that. -It's okay. It's okay.
translation.zh:
-对不起 让我来处理
-没关系 没关系

translation.en: Are those index cards?
translation.zh: 那些是索引卡片吗？

translation.en: No. Index-- They're napkins.
translation.zh: 不 索引...是餐巾

translation.en: They're not index cards with writing on them.
translation.zh: 不是上面有字的索引卡片

translation.en: Let me get some more napkins.
translation.zh: 让我再拿些餐巾纸

translation.en: That's okay, really. I think--
translation.zh: 没关系 真的 我想...

translation.en: Sweet balls!
translation.zh: 可爱的球啊！

translation.en: I can't believe that happened.
translation.zh: 我不相信会发生这样的事

translation.en: I'm sorry about all the gravity.
translation.zh: 对不起 全是因为地球引力

translation.en: Are you all right?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry, Oliver.
translation.zh: 对不起 奥利佛

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: I need to go.
translation.zh: 我要走了

translation.en: Come on, Puffin, you've been in here for days.
translation.zh: 别啊 你在这里好多天了

translation.en: Let's watch a movie, it'll make you feel better.
translation.zh: 我们去看电影吧 你会好受些

translation.en: I don't get it.
translation.zh: 我不懂

translation.en: Why would Shelley just leave?
translation.zh: 谢丽怎么就走了？

translation.en: It's for the best. She wasn't happy.
translation.zh: 这样最好 她不快乐

translation.en: I used to hear her crying in her room late at night.
translation.zh: 我以前在夜里听到她哭

translation.en: I think I'd like to be alone for a bit.
translation.zh: 我想我要单独呆一会儿

translation.en: I could stay with you.
translation.zh: 我可以陪你

translation.en: No, just bring me more ice cream.
translation.zh: 不用 就再给我拿些冰淇淋来吧

translation.en: Egg! Paprika!
translation.zh: 鸡蛋！辣椒面！

translation.en: Nutmeg! Who cares? Who cares?
translation.zh: 肉豆蔻！谁在乎？

translation.en: What have I done to poor Shelley?
translation.zh: 我对谢丽怎么了？

translation.en: -You're not gonna tell him, are you? -No. You can't.
translation.zh: 你不会告诉他吧？ 不 你不能

translation.en: I'm gonna be the next Miss November, not that little blonde bitch.
translation.zh:
我要成为下一个十一月小姐
而不是那个金发小婊子

translation.en: You found my weakness, used it against me like kryptonite,
translation.zh:
你发现了我的弱点
就无情地加以利用

translation.en: but that's never gonna happen again.
translation.zh: 但这再也不会发生了

translation.en: Oh, Mr. Hefner...
translation.zh: 〝哦 赫夫纳先生...〞

translation.en: Guys, remember, we only need 30, okay?
translation.zh: 各位 记住 我们只需要30人 好吗？

translation.en: First up,
translation.zh: 第一个

translation.en: Kristen Withers.
translation.zh: 克里斯滕维瑟斯

translation.en: Pre-med, family in Greenwich.
translation.zh: 医学预科 家在格林威治

translation.en: -Yeah, so cute. -I like.
translation.zh:
-耶 真可爱
-我喜欢

translation.en: Cute, cute. Totally.
translation.zh: 可爱 真可爱

translation.en: -No doubt. -Very cute.
translation.zh:
-毫无疑问
-非常可爱

translation.en: -In. -Guys...
translation.zh:
-时髦
-各位...

translation.en: We just made our first pledge acceptance.
translation.zh: 我们刚刚录取了第一个申请

translation.en: Okay, cool. All right. Next up, Jill Palmer.
translation.zh: 好吧 很酷 下一个 吉尔帕尔姆

translation.en: Colorado, theater major... Her father owns, like, half of Aspen.
translation.zh:
科罗拉多州 戏剧专业...
她的父亲拥有半个阿斯彭

translation.en: -Yes. -Yeah!
translation.zh:
-对
-耶！

translation.en: Why am I such a yummy dummy?
translation.zh: 为什么我是这样一个可爱的小傻瓜？

translation.en: Next one.
translation.zh: 下一个

translation.en: Nancy Nagle. English major from Florida.
translation.zh: 南希奈哥尔 佛罗里达来的英文系学生

translation.en: She does drive a Porsche.
translation.zh: 但她可是开保时捷的

translation.en: I don't know about her. I feel like we've created an image.
translation.zh:
我对于这个不敢说
我觉得我们创造了这种形象

translation.en: I just don't feel like she's gonna fit in.
translation.zh: 我觉得她不会适应这里的

translation.en: She should have spent the Porsche money on a nose job.
translation.zh:
我就是说 她应该把花在保时捷上的钱
做个鼻子美容

translation.en: She said she broke it in a skiing accident, I'm like,
translation.zh:
她说她去年滑雪事故
摔伤了鼻子 我就说

translation.en: "I'm sure the surgeon would take the Porsche as a trade-in."
translation.zh:
〝好吧 我相信鼻子整容医生
肯定愿意折价买下保时捷〞

translation.en: Booya! Snap!
translation.zh: 天啊！经典！

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: Hey, Shelley, it's me.
translation.zh: 嗨 谢丽 是我

translation.en: -Hef? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-赫夫？
-对

translation.en: Hef? Oh, is this you? Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh: 赫夫？哦 是你吗？哦 我的天

translation.en: How are you? Like, I can't believe you're calling me.
translation.zh: 你好吗？ 我真不敢相信你给我打电话

translation.en: How is everybody at the Mansion? How are things?
translation.zh:
豪宅里面的各位如何？
近来好吗？

translation.en: Good news. I'm gonna make you next month's centerfold.
translation.zh:
好消息 我要把你定为
下个月的夹页女郎

translation.en: You're making me Miss November?
translation.zh: 你让我当十一月小姐？

translation.en: -That's right. -Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh:
-对
-哦 我的天

translation.en: Are you totally serious, or is this not Hef?
translation.zh: 你完全当真吗 你不是赫夫吧？

translation.en: If this is Hef, blink once. If it isn't Hef, blink twice. Did you blink?
translation.zh:
如果你是赫夫 眨一下眼
如果不是赫夫 眨两下眼 你眨眼了吗？

translation.en: I'm so glad you haven't changed, Shelley.
translation.zh: 我真高兴 你一点没变 谢丽

translation.en: I want you to move back to the Mansion.
translation.zh: 我想让你搬回豪宅

translation.en: It's just not the same without you here.
translation.zh: 没了你 这里一切都变了

translation.en: Hef, I just can't believe it.
translation.zh: 赫夫 我真不能相信

translation.en: Believe it, baby. Okay, here's what happens.
translation.zh: 相信吧 宝贝 好吧 事情是这样的

translation.en: We shoot the pictorial, we'll have you do a 25-city tour of the U.S.
translation.zh:
我们拍摄画报 我们要让你
周游美国25个城市

translation.en: From there travel Europe, ending with a one-week stay in Monaco.
translation.zh: 然后我们去欧洲旅行 结束的时候在摩纳哥呆一个星期

translation.en: We're gonna coordinate your pictorial
translation.zh: 我们会协调你的画报工作

translation.en: with a Playboy documentary on the life of a centerfold.
translation.zh:
和《花花公子频道》有关
夹页女郎生活的纪录片

translation.en: The exposure's going to be wonderful, but it doesn't stop there.
translation.zh:
这样的曝光会很棒的
但还没有完

translation.en: We're pulling out all the stops for this one. It's going to be huge.
translation.zh: 我们会全力以赴的 谢丽 你肯定会大红大紫

translation.en: Hef?
translation.zh: 赫夫？

translation.en: Yeah, baby?
translation.zh: 怎么啦 宝贝？

translation.en: Hef, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 赫夫 对不起

translation.en: I'm so happy that you called me.
translation.zh: 你给我打电话我很高兴

translation.en: And I love you, but I don't think I can do it.
translation.zh: 我爱你 但我做不到

translation.en: I can't leave my Zeta girls.
translation.zh: 我不能离开泽塔的姐妹们

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I'm not going anywhere.
translation.zh: 我哪儿都不去

translation.en: I'm home.
translation.zh: 这是我的家

translation.en: Katootoo Jihiman.
translation.zh: 卡图图季西曼

translation.en: Sociology major from India. Everyone?
translation.zh: 来自印度 社会学专业 都同意吗？

translation.en: I remember this one. Seems kind of weird.
translation.zh: 我记得这个人 她似乎有点怪

translation.en: I actually got that too.
translation.zh: 我也有那种印象

translation.en: Not like "I live in the wall and eat crickets" weird, but just like a little off.
translation.zh: 并不是〝我住在墙里吃蟋蟀〞那种怪 但是有点不主流

translation.en: -Boo to Katootoo. -Next.
translation.zh:
-否决卡图图
-下一个

translation.en: Stop it! Stop it! Stop it!
translation.zh: 停下！

translation.en: Lilly?
translation.zh: 莉莉？

translation.en: Look at you people!
translation.zh: 看看你们这些人！

translation.en: Honestly, is this really what you've become?
translation.zh: 老实说 这真是你们变成的样子吗？

translation.en: Judging other girls on their appearance? Calling them weird?
translation.zh:
看外表来判断其他姑娘？
说他们古怪？

translation.en: I'm sure glad I joined when I did, because honestly,
translation.zh:
我加入的时候当然也高兴
因为说实话

translation.en: I don't think I would make the cut now. And neither would a lot of you.
translation.zh:
我不觉得
这些日子以来我就主流了 你们很多也不主流啊

translation.en: I can't believe that Zeta's become just like Phi Iota Mu.
translation.zh:
我不能相信泽塔变得
像菲劳塔姆那样

translation.en: A bunch of snooty bitches!
translation.zh: 一帮世俗的婊子！

translation.en: Lilly, you talked.
translation.zh: 莉莉 你说话了

translation.en: And you're British?
translation.zh: 你是英国人吗？

translation.en: Hi, everybody. I'm home.
translation.zh: 嗨 各位 我回来了

translation.en: This is all your fault.
translation.zh: 这都是你的错

translation.en: Yeah. You know what, Mona? You're right.
translation.zh: 对 你知道吗 莫娜？你是对的

translation.en: It all started with this fake hair and your stupid water bras.
translation.zh: 都是从这假发和你愚蠢的水胸罩开始的

translation.en: Before you got here we were individuals. You've turned us all into stupid bimbos.
translation.zh:
你知道吗？
你们来这里之前 我们都是独立个体 你让我们变成了些愚蠢的无脑美人

translation.en: -We were fine. -We look ridiculous.
translation.zh:
-我们本来的样子挺好的
-可现在看着很滑稽

translation.en: -I'm getting Cs. -Why do I look like this?
translation.zh:
-我所有科目都刚及格
-为什么我这个样子？

translation.en: -This isn't me. -I can't believe you let me do this.
translation.zh:
-这不是我的本来面目
-我不能相信你让我变成这样

translation.en: Guys, stop. Come on, stop, stop.
translation.zh: 各位 别说了 停停

translation.en: Guys.
translation.zh: 各位

translation.en: I understand, and I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我理解 对不起

translation.en: So I...
translation.zh: 所以 我...

translation.en: Thank you guys for everything.
translation.zh: 谢谢你们大家

translation.en: I'm gonna go, and I really hope to see you guys in the future.
translation.zh: 我要走了 我真希望将来再见

translation.en: Shelley.
translation.zh: 谢丽

translation.en: Hi, Hef, it's Shelley.
translation.zh: 嗨 赫夫 是我谢丽

translation.en: I was just kidding, silly.
translation.zh: 我开玩笑呢 傻瓜

translation.en: I can't wait to be back at the Mansion and be a centerfold.
translation.zh:
我等不及了 我要回豪宅
做夹页女郎

translation.en: This is the happiest day of my life.
translation.zh: 这是我一生中最幸福的一天

translation.en: Dear Oliver,
translation.zh: 亲爱的奥利佛

translation.en: I'm so sorry I couldn't tell you this in person.
translation.zh: 对不起我不能亲自告诉你

translation.en: It was way too embarrassing to face you after everything.
translation.zh:
发生了这么多事情后
面对你太尴尬

translation.en: I am leaving the Zeta house to fulfill my lifelong dream.
translation.zh: 我要离开泽塔屋去完成我毕生的梦想

translation.en: And I know that what I've decided to do won't make any sense to you at all,
translation.zh: 我知道我的决定不会让你理解

translation.en: but I have joined the Peace Corps,
translation.zh: 但我已经加入了和平队

translation.en: and I'm going off to work in the mountains of a country called Peru.
translation.zh:
我要到一个叫秘鲁的国家
去深山里工作

translation.en: I'm going to meet lots of interesting people.
translation.zh: 我会遇到很多有趣的人

translation.en: I'm sure it'll be very hot where I'm going.
translation.zh: 无论我去哪儿 肯定都会大受欢迎

translation.en: And even though it's going to be super-hot,
translation.zh: 虽然天气会很热

translation.en: I will be bundled up in clothes, barely showing any flesh.
translation.zh:
我也会捂上很多衣服
几乎不露肉

translation.en: I only tell you because I don't want you to worry
translation.zh: 我告诉你 只是不想让你担心 我不会晒伤的

translation.en: about me getting sunburned.
translation.zh: 我不会晒伤的

translation.en: Hef told me what you did, and I don't think it was very sisterly of you.
translation.zh:
赫夫告诉我你做的事
我觉得那样很不够姐们

translation.en: You are so vapid.
translation.zh: 你太超乎想象了

translation.en: Actually, I'm ingenious and philanthropic, and you're a backstabbing bitch.
translation.zh:
实际上 我单纯而且乐善好施
你是个背后捅刀子的婊子

translation.en: -Nice, Shelley. That was awesome. -Shelley!
translation.zh:
-很好 谢丽太棒了
-谢丽！

translation.en: I hope everybody at the old folks' home is doing great.
translation.zh: 我希望老人院的每个人都好

translation.en: And as for the Zeta girls, I'm sure they're doing fine.
translation.zh: 至于泽塔的姑娘们 我相信他们很好

translation.en: Oliver, I hope you think of me every once in a while, and when you do,
translation.zh:
奥利佛 我希望你常常想起我
当你想我的时候

translation.en: I hope they are good thoughts.
translation.zh: 我希望都是些美好的回忆

translation.en: Pooter!
translation.zh: 普特！

translation.en: Love, Shelley.
translation.zh: 爱你的 谢丽

translation.en: There you are.
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: So we'll be half Shelley and half who we really are.
translation.zh:
所以 我们一半是谢丽
一半是我们真实的自己

translation.en: Can we be 60 percent Shelley?
translation.zh: 我们能做到60%谢丽吗？

translation.en: I mean, say what you want about her, but the girl had style.
translation.zh:
我是说 你们说她什么都行
但那个姑娘有骨气

translation.en: -What? -"She had style"?
translation.zh:
-什么？
-〝她有骨气？〞

translation.en: She still does. I mean, she just wants to be back at the Playboy Mansion.
translation.zh: 是啊 她就是想回到花花公子豪宅

translation.en: Whatever we're gonna be, we need to figure out.
translation.zh:
嗯 无论我们成为什么样的人
我们都需要懂得你们

translation.en: We still need 30 pledges by October 15th, or we can just kiss it all goodbye.
translation.zh:
10月15日之前 我们还需要30个人加入
否则我们就要说再见了

translation.en: Who wants to be a part of something real? Zeta.
translation.zh: 谁想成为真实的自己？ 泽塔

translation.en: Hi. Zeta. Tell 29 of your friends.
translation.zh: 嗨 泽塔 告诉你29个朋友

translation.en: Listen up, ladies! Zeta was founded on the tenets of sisterhood,
translation.zh:
听着 女士们！泽塔建立于
姊妹精神

translation.en: friendship and philanthropy.
translation.zh: 友谊和慈善信条之上

translation.en: Here you go.
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: And since then, we've added some kick-ass parties to the list.
translation.zh:
对 自那以来 我们就将一些
绝妙的派对加到了单子上

translation.en: But instead of judging and rejecting,
translation.zh: 对 但不进行品评和拒绝

translation.en: we'll put all the pledges into a bowl, and draw 30.
translation.zh:
我们将所有的候选人都放入碗里
从中抽取30个名字

translation.en: Natalie? What'd you do to your hair?
translation.zh: 娜塔丽？你的头发怎么了？

translation.en: -I could change it back. -Why?
translation.zh:
-我还能变回来
-为什么？

translation.en: Everyone gets haircuts.
translation.zh: 每个人都剪了头发

translation.en: People have lots of styles all over the world.
translation.zh: 世界上的人们有很多不同风格

translation.en: In China, they usually tend to layer it, I've noticed.
translation.zh:
在中国
我注意到 人们通常分层次

translation.en: This isn't China. I just-- I could put it back how it was.
translation.zh:
不过 这不是中国 所以我只是...
你知道 我还能变回老样子

translation.en: Oh, no, no. Why, why, why? You look great.
translation.zh:
哦 不 为什么？
你看上去很好

translation.en: -I do? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-真的？
-对啊

translation.en: Well, I mean, you looked great before, with the hair.
translation.zh: 嗯 我的意思是 你以前的发型就很好

translation.en: But, I mean, this feels more you.
translation.zh: 但是 这更符合你的风格

translation.en: I mean, it's not like I want you to be my girlfriend
translation.zh:
我的意思是 我并不只是
因为你的发型

translation.en: just because of your hairstyle. So...
translation.zh: 才想要你做我的女朋友 所以...

translation.en: Your girlfriend?
translation.zh: 你的女朋友？

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to--
translation.zh: 哦 对不起 我不是故意...

translation.en: It's kind of presumptuous.
translation.zh: 这是种假设

translation.en: Like, "Wanna be my girlfriend? Sit next to me."
translation.zh:
就像是说：〝嗨 你想做我的女朋友？
坐我旁边吧〞

translation.en: You don't want to be my girlfriend.
translation.zh:
不 我是说
你不想要我当你的女朋友

translation.en: You got guys falling from trees for you, and it's like...
translation.zh: 男人为你会从树上跳下来 就好像...

translation.en: Here I am, just a goofy dude.
translation.zh: 我在这 一个小傻瓜

translation.en: "Goofy dude"?
translation.zh: 〝小傻瓜〞？

translation.en: Colby, I want to be your girlfriend more than an electron wants to attach to a proton.
translation.zh:
柯比 我比电子受到质子吸引
还要强烈地想做你女朋友

translation.en: -That much? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-那么强烈？
-对

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 对吗？

translation.en: What? What?
translation.zh: 怎么？

translation.en: Did I mess that up? Because I can do that so much better.
translation.zh:
我又搞砸了？
因为我能做得更好呢

translation.en: No, I was just thanking Shelley.
translation.zh: 不 我就是要感谢谢丽

translation.en: Oh. Thank you, Shelley.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 谢丽

translation.en: Okay, guys. Close your eyes.
translation.zh: 好吧 各位 闭上眼睛

translation.en: This is it. We're gonna keep the Zeta house.
translation.zh: 就这样 我们还会保住泽塔屋

translation.en: -Oh, my gosh. -Go, Zeta! Go, Zeta! Go, Zeta!
translation.zh:
-哦 我的天
-走 泽塔！

translation.en: Lilly, go mail the bids.
translation.zh: 莉莉 去把竞标文件寄走

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Are you new on campus?
translation.zh: 你是校园新生吗？

translation.en: I don't think we've ever met.
translation.zh: 我想我们没见过

translation.en: I'm Cole. Cole Trickle.
translation.zh: 我是柯尔 柯尔特立克

translation.en: Yes. Yes, I just transferred.
translation.zh: 对 我刚转学过来

translation.en: My name is Lilly.
translation.zh: 我叫莉莉

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
translation.zh:
-嗨
-嗨

translation.en: That girl over there just dropped these on the floor,
translation.zh:
那边的女孩刚才把这些
掉在地板上了

translation.en: and she's really into that guy.
translation.zh: 她真是迷上那个男生了

translation.en: -I don't want to interrupt her. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-我不想打搅她
-好吧

translation.en: -Can you mail these for her? -Sure thing.
translation.zh:
-你能把这些替她寄走吗？
-当然

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: You should totally mail me your number sometime.
translation.zh: 你应该把你的号码寄给我

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Just give it to me. I have a great memory.
translation.zh: 给我就行了 我记性好

translation.en: Where are my envelopes?
translation.zh: 我的信封呐？

translation.en: You dropped them, but I got it, they're gonna be mailed right out.
translation.zh:
哦 你掉了 但我捡了
它们会被立即寄走的

translation.en: Oh, thank you so much.
translation.zh: 哦 非常感谢

translation.en: -Okay, my number's 7-6- -Anyway, it was great meeting you, Nelly.
translation.zh:
-好吧 我的号码是7-6...
-无论如何 很高兴认识你 奈莉

translation.en: Oh, but my name is Lilly, actually.
translation.zh: 哦 但我实际上叫莉莉

translation.en: Yeah, whatever.
translation.zh: 对 无论叫什么

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: -Now can I see your pizzanties? -No.
translation.zh: 现在我能看你的内裤了吗？ 不

translation.en: I don't get it.
translation.zh: 我不理解

translation.en: Why didn't anyone show up?
translation.zh: 为什么没人来呢？

translation.en: You guys, come here and look at this.
translation.zh: 你们来看看这个

translation.en: I'm Ashley. Come on in. Nice to meet you guys.
translation.zh:
我是艾诗里 进来吧
很高兴见到各位

translation.en: You did send out the invitations, didn't you?
translation.zh: 你发出邀请信了 对吧？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: But there was this boy there.
translation.zh: 但是有这个男孩啊

translation.en: And I never talked to a boy before. You know?
translation.zh:
我从来都没和男生讲过话
你知道吗？

translation.en: And he distracted me. Just for a minute.
translation.zh: 他分散了我的注意力 就一分钟

translation.en: And then I saw him talking to Ashley.
translation.zh: 然后我看他和艾诗里说话去了

translation.en: They knew each other. I could tell by the way they talked, and....
translation.zh:
他们互相认识 我能从他们说话
的样子看出来 而且... 而且...

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: People, all right. That's enough. Let's go. We're done.
translation.zh:
各位 好了 够了 我们走吧 我们完成了 我们在拍十一月小姐
不是十二月小姐 我们这么干

translation.en: Shooting Miss November, not Miss December.
translation.zh:
我们完成了 我们在拍十一月小姐
不是十二月小姐 我们这么干

translation.en: Give me the fog. Wind, let's go. Music, let's go.
translation.zh:
给我来点儿雾 风 起来
音乐 起来

translation.en: Let's shoot this. Miss November. Immortality! Let's go!
translation.zh:
我们拍这个 十一月小姐
不朽啊！开始！

translation.en: Here we go. It's Shelley time. Come on, it's so hot.
translation.zh:
好了 就这些 这是谢丽时间
来啊 谢丽 真火爆

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Sexy. Sell it. Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh:
哦 对了 性感
表现啊 谢丽 哦 我的天

translation.en: You're gorgeous, Shelley. So hot!
translation.zh: 你太棒了 谢丽 真火辣！

translation.en: Work it, Shelley! Come on, let's see--
translation.zh:
继续 努力 谢丽！
继续 让我们看些...

translation.en: Shelley?
translation.zh: 谢丽？

translation.en: Stop the fog, Dave. Barry, hold the wind, please.
translation.zh:
停 停止雾气 戴夫
柏瑞 停住风扇

translation.en: What's wrong, babe? You okay? You sad? Sad monkey?
translation.zh:
怎么了 宝贝？
你还好吗？伤心了？伤心的小猴子？

translation.en: -I don't think I'm your Miss November. -What?
translation.zh: 我觉得我不是你的十一月小姐 什么？

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Shelley, wait. Shelley. Shelley, come on. Shelley--
translation.zh:
谢丽 等等
谢丽 别这样 谢丽...

translation.en: Is she serious?
translation.zh: 她是认真的吗？

translation.en: Shelley! Shell-monkey!
translation.zh: 谢丽！谢小猴！

translation.en: Should we take a shower and talk about it? Shelley!
translation.zh: 我们洗个澡谈谈吧？谢丽！

translation.en: Natalie?
translation.zh: 娜塔丽？

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. How did you find me?
translation.zh: 哦 我的天 你怎么找到我的？

translation.en: Oh, just-- A little bird told me.
translation.zh: 哦 只是...一只小鸟告诉我的

translation.en: What bird?
translation.zh: 什么鸟？

translation.en: Marvin called us. I thought-- We didn't think you liked us anymore.
translation.zh: 马文给我们打了电话 我想... 我们觉得 你不喜欢我们了

translation.en: Oh, my gosh, no. I've missed you so much.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天 不是 我一直在想念你们

translation.en: Oh, hi, girls. Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh: 哦 嗨 哦 我的天

translation.en: You guys look beautiful!
translation.zh: 你们大家看上去很美丽！

translation.en: Oh, I've missed you guys so much.
translation.zh: 哦 我真是想你们啊

translation.en: You're the best housemother anyone's ever had.
translation.zh: 你是最好的舍监

translation.en: -I'm really sorry for what I said to you. -We really miss you, Shelley.
translation.zh: 我真为我向你说的话后悔 我知道 我们真想你啊 谢丽

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-对
-对

translation.en: So, how'd the rest of rush go? Did you guys get your pledges?
translation.zh:
那么 其他人忙什么呢？
你们拿到足够申请了吗？

translation.en: Zeta had a ton of people interested, thanks to you.
translation.zh:
有很多很多人对泽塔感兴趣
别误解 这都要感谢你

translation.en: But nobody showed up because Ashley stole all of our bids.
translation.zh:
但没人出现 因为艾诗里
偷了我们全部的申请

translation.en: No. So the house is gone?
translation.zh: 不 那么房子没了？

translation.en: They'll make it official today
translation.zh: 他们今天下午正式

translation.en: at the Panhellenic Council meeting this afternoon.
translation.zh: 在姊妹会代表大会上宣布

translation.en: -So there's still a chance. -It's too late.
translation.zh: 所以仍有一线希望 谢丽 太晚了

translation.en: I mean, I don't think there's anything we can do.
translation.zh: 我是说 我觉得我们没什么可做的了

translation.en: Natalie! Together we can do anything!
translation.zh: 娜塔丽！我们在一起 无坚不摧！

translation.en: Today's meeting is tinged with sadness.
translation.zh: 今天的会议掺杂着悲伤之情

translation.en: Unfortunately, not all of us will be returning next year.
translation.zh:
不幸的是 明年我们中的有些人
就不会回来了

translation.en: Yes, that's true. So with that said, it brings us to our last order of business.
translation.zh:
对 真是这样 让我们讨论
最后一项议题

translation.en: Stop!
translation.zh: 停停！

translation.en: Oh, dear.
translation.zh: 哦 亲爱的

translation.en: We're here to save our house.
translation.zh: 我们来此拯救我们的宿舍

translation.en: I don't know how this big meeting stuff works, but I just...
translation.zh:
我不知道这个大会是怎么回事
但我只想...

translation.en: Enough with the freak show.
translation.zh: 闹剧搞完了吧

translation.en: What I was saying, before I was so rudely interrupted, is that...
translation.zh:
在我被粗鲁打断之前
我说的是...

translation.en: Hold on! Wait.
translation.zh: 等等！等一下

translation.en: I have something to say.
translation.zh: 我有话要说

translation.en: Shelley, say something.
translation.zh: 谢丽 说点儿什么吧

translation.en: I'm allergic to erythromycin.
translation.zh: 我对红霉素过敏

translation.en: Oh, for God's sake, Dean Simmons. Enough is enough. Do something.
translation.zh:
哦 我的天 西蒙斯校长
够了 采取行动吧

translation.en: Shelley? The council has come here to really finalize this, so...
translation.zh:
谢丽？委员会今天在此
就是要了解此事 所以...

translation.en: No! No! This is germane to our predicament.
translation.zh: 不！这与我们的困境休戚相关

translation.en: Oh, well, as long as it's germane. Please continue.
translation.zh:
哦 我的天 既然休戚相关
那就请继续

translation.en: Just give her a minute.
translation.zh: 给她一分钟

translation.en: I'm allergic to erythromycin.
translation.zh: 我对红霉素过敏

translation.en: I took it once when I had a cold. I was 16, and it gave me itching.
translation.zh:
我有一次感冒吃了一次
我16岁 我浑身发痒

translation.en: I mean, everything itched. My legs, my arms, my earlobes.
translation.zh:
我是说 到处都痒
我的大腿 胳膊 耳垂

translation.en: And other stuff, but I can't say, because I'm on the air right now,
translation.zh:
其它地方也痒 但我不能说
因为我现在在播音

translation.en: -and you can't say "ass cheeks," right? -You just did.
translation.zh: 就不能说〝屁股蛋〞 对吗？ 你刚说了

translation.en: But I said it kind of quietly, I think.
translation.zh: 但我觉得我是悄悄说的

translation.en: But besides the itching, erythromycin also made my skin glow.
translation.zh:
除了痒以外 红霉素
还让我的皮肤放光

translation.en: It gave me, like, this glowing tan.
translation.zh: 带给我有光泽的棕褐色

translation.en: And I suddenly felt like another person.
translation.zh: 我突然感到自己好像另外一个人

translation.en: Different.
translation.zh: 不同了

translation.en: Better.
translation.zh: 更好了

translation.en: Prettier, I guess.
translation.zh: 我猜 更漂亮了

translation.en: -What's your name? -Michelle.
translation.zh:
-你叫什么名字？
-米切尔

translation.en: Michelle.
translation.zh: 米切尔

translation.en: Michelle, do you know that feeling I'm talking about?
translation.zh: 米切尔 你知道我说的这种感觉吗？

translation.en: Where you suddenly feel pretty
translation.zh: 你突然感到更漂亮

translation.en: and, next thing you know, you feel better about yourself?
translation.zh: 紧接着 你就自我感觉更好了？

translation.en: Well, that was what was happening to me.
translation.zh: 嗯 这是我身上发生的事情

translation.en: My allergic reaction made me feel pretty,
translation.zh: 我的过敏反应让我感到更漂亮了

translation.en: and so I ignored all the bad side effects, because suddenly people were talking to me
translation.zh:
我不理睬所有的不良副作用
因为突然间 人们开始和我说话了

translation.en: and they were noticing me.
translation.zh: 他们注意我了

translation.en: And even though I was itching like crazy,
translation.zh: 虽然我浑身发痒

translation.en: it was worth it to feel accepted.
translation.zh: 但是得到社会接纳还是值得的

translation.en: And so I couldn't wait to get a cold so I could take my erythromycin.
translation.zh:
所以我等不及了 特想感冒
这样就能吃红霉素了

translation.en: But underneath that beautiful, glowing skin, I still had that cold.
translation.zh:
但是在美丽 发光的皮肤下
我还是感冒的

translation.en: Well, that's a meteor.
translation.zh: 嗯 这就如流星

translation.en: The word is "Metaphor."
translation.zh: 那个词该是〝比喻〞

translation.en: Can you really be that dumb?
translation.zh: 你真是那么傻吗？

translation.en: She's not dumb.
translation.zh: 她不傻

translation.en: Thank you, Natalie.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 娜塔丽

translation.en: And, Mrs. Hagstrom, I meant "Meteor."
translation.zh: 哈格斯托姆夫人 我是说的〝流星〞

translation.en: It flashes by and burns bright, but then it disappears.
translation.zh:
它一闪而过明亮耀眼
但随即消失

translation.en: And that was what was happening to me.
translation.zh: 这就是发生在我身上的事

translation.en: The real me just disappeared.
translation.zh: 真的我消失了

translation.en: Is anyone buying this?
translation.zh: 有人相信吗？

translation.en: I am not an expert speech-giver.
translation.zh: 我不是职业演说家

translation.en: But I do know that one day, when your looks are gone,
translation.zh:
但我知道有一天
当你的容颜老去

translation.en: if everything you have is based on looks, well, then you've got nothing.
translation.zh:
如果你所拥有的都基于相貌
那么你就什么都没有了

translation.en: You need your friends and your family by your side,
translation.zh: 你需要朋友 家人在你身边

translation.en: to love you for who you are, not what you look like.
translation.zh: 爱你的本人 而不是你的样子

translation.en: At the Zeta house, our new motto is, "Be who you are."
translation.zh:
在泽塔居 我们的新信条是
〝做本来的我〞

translation.en: Because we're a family.
translation.zh: 因为我们是一个家庭

translation.en: We're a family that loves you on the inside.
translation.zh: 我们是一家 热爱的是你的内在

translation.en: So we need you to stand forward and be a part of that family.
translation.zh: 我们需要你站出来 成为这个家的一员

translation.en: We need 30 people right now to stand forward and pledge Zeta!
translation.zh:
我们现在需要30个人站出来
加入泽塔！

translation.en: Hey, honey! You had me at "itchy ass cheeks." I'm in.
translation.zh:
嗨 甜心！
你〝痒屁股蛋〞有我一份 我加入

translation.en: Me too! Me too!
translation.zh: 我也是！

translation.en: Me too!
translation.zh: 我也是！

translation.en: -I'll be a Zeta! -Me, too!
translation.zh:
-我也要进泽塔！
-还有我！

translation.en: -Me, too. -I'll pledge!
translation.zh:
-还有我
-我加入！

translation.en: -Six, seven, eight, nine, 10, 11! -Me, too!
-I'll pledge! -Twelve! Thirteen! Come on, we need 30.
translation.zh:
-我加入！
-12！13！继续 我们需要30个

translation.en: -I'll do it! -Fourteen.
-Get your hand down. -Fifteen. Sixteen.
translation.zh:
-放下你的手
-15 16

translation.en: Seventeen, 18, 19, 20. Excellent! Twenty-one!
-Twenty-two. 23. Come on! -I'll be in Zeta!
translation.zh:
-22 23 继续！
-我要来泽塔！

translation.en: -Twenty-four, 25. -Up here! Pick me!
translation.zh:
-24 25
-上面这儿！选上我！

translation.en: Twenty-six, on top. Thank you. 27.
translation.zh:
26 上面
谢谢你 27

translation.en: New pledger, right there. Come on, two more!
translation.zh:
新的会员 这里
来啊 再来两个！

translation.en: Twenty-eight, 29!
Just need one more. Come on, everybody.
translation.zh:
再来一个 只要一个了
继续 各位

translation.en: One more. One more. Get your hand up. Come on! Be a Zeta.
translation.zh:
再来一个 举起手来
继续！成为泽塔一员

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 继续！

translation.en: Come on! Come on, one more! Just need one more Zeta.
translation.zh:
继续！再来一个！
只要一个泽塔了

translation.en: One more, one more. Come on!
translation.zh: 再来一个 继续

translation.en: Pound the gavel! Why are you dragging this out?
translation.zh:
敲槌！
为什么你把这个拿出来了？

translation.en: There's nobody else! It's over. Zetas.
translation.zh: 没人了！结束了 哈 泽塔姊妹们

translation.en: Wait!
translation.zh: 等等！

translation.en: There's one more new Zeta!
translation.zh: 还有一个新泽塔会员呢！

translation.en: No. Sorry.
translation.zh: 不 对不起

translation.en: Can't be a baby pledging a sorority. You gotta be a student.
translation.zh:
婴儿不能承诺加入姊妹会
你得是学生

translation.en: That's right!
translation.zh: 对啊！

translation.en: Rules are rules. Oh, well. Bye-bye.
translation.zh: 规则就是规则 哦 好吧 再见

translation.en: Time to pound the gavel. Meeting adjourned. Pound that gavel.
translation.zh: 要敲槌了 会议结束 铛 敲槌 校长

translation.en: I'm very sorry, girls. I know how hard you've worked for this.
translation.zh:
我真抱歉 姑娘们
我知道你们有多努力

translation.en: It hurts me to do this, but I...
translation.zh: 我这么做也很伤心 但我...

translation.en: Stop! I would like to pledge Zeta.
translation.zh: 停！我愿意加入泽塔

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I like everything that Shelley said.
translation.zh: 我喜欢谢丽所说的一切

translation.en: Are you out of your mind?
translation.zh: 你疯啦？

translation.en: And, God, do you know how sick to death I am of you?
translation.zh: 天啊 你知道我对你有多反感吗？

translation.en: Of Phi Iota Mu?
translation.zh: 对菲劳塔姆？

translation.en: I've been in Phi Iota Mu hell!
translation.zh: 我一直呆在菲劳塔姆地狱里！

translation.en: I want to be a Zeta.
translation.zh: 我要当泽塔会员

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Okay, so Zetas keep their house.
translation.zh: 好吧 泽塔姑娘们保住了她们的房子

translation.en: Meeting adjourned.
translation.zh: 会议结束

translation.en: Now, go study something.
translation.zh: 现在 开始研究研究

translation.en: What are we supposed to do now?
translation.zh: 我们现在应该怎么做？

translation.en: Let's start with this.
translation.zh: 让我们从这个开始吧

translation.en: Oh, I love my weird home.
translation.zh: 哦 我热爱我古怪的家

translation.en: Things that I like!
translation.zh: 我喜欢的东西

translation.en: Ottoman! Oh, I love you, ottoman.
translation.zh: 奥特曼！哦 我爱你 奥特曼

translation.en: -This house is so nice! -I know.
translation.zh:
-这个房子真好！
-我知道

translation.en: I mean, so cool.
translation.zh: 我是说 真酷

translation.en: -You want me to show you upstairs? -Yes! Show me!
translation.zh:
-嗨 你想我带你看看楼上吗？
-行！给我看

translation.en: This is so great.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: Everything worked out so perfectly.
translation.zh: 所有的事情都完美

translation.en: Well, not perfectly.
translation.zh: 嗯 还不完美

translation.en: I mean, I messed up things with Oliver because I moved to Peru and left him a note.
translation.zh:
我和奥利佛搞糟了
因为我去了秘鲁给他留了封信

translation.en: Well, Shelley, you didn't really move to Peru.
translation.zh: 嗯 谢丽 你没有真的去秘鲁

translation.en: I know that, but he doesn't.
translation.zh: 我知道 但他不知道

translation.en: Oliver.
translation.zh: 奥利佛

translation.en: I was literally just talking about you. How did you know that I got back?
translation.zh:
我刚刚谈到你
你怎么知道我回来了？

translation.en: Let's just say a little bird told me.
translation.zh: 就说一只小鸟告诉我的

translation.en: I gotta meet this frickin' bird!
translation.zh: 我要见见这只可恶的鸟！

translation.en: It's me, Shell.
translation.zh: 是我 谢丽

translation.en: I'm the bird. I called Oliver.
translation.zh: 我是那只鸟 我给奥利佛打电话

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: It's so great to have such nice friends.
translation.zh: 有这么好的朋友真好啊

translation.en: And, Oliver, I have to admit, I never went to Peru.
translation.zh: 奥利佛 我要承认 我根本没去秘鲁

translation.en: -I know. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-我知道
-谢谢你

translation.en: You're welcome.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: And I was in Playboy.
translation.zh: 我以前上过《花花公子》杂志

translation.en: I know that too. And I don't care.
translation.zh: 我也知道 我不在乎

translation.en: I would like to try this again.
translation.zh: 我还想再试试

translation.en: Except this time, no manhole covers or bubble gum.
translation.zh:
只是这次
不会站在井盖上也不会有泡泡糖

translation.en: You know, just see where this goes.
translation.zh: 你知道 我们看发展吧

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -I'd like that. -Great.
translation.zh:
-我喜欢这样
-太好了

translation.en: Oliver.
translation.zh: 奥利佛

translation.en: Oliver.
translation.zh: 奥利佛

translation.en: -I'm Shelley. -Nice to meet you again, Shelley.
translation.zh:
-我是谢丽
-很高兴再见到你 谢丽

translation.en: Dear Hef, everything worked out!
translation.zh: 亲爱的赫夫 一切都解决了！

translation.en: We got 30 new Zeta sisters, and the house was saved.
translation.zh:
我们有了30个新的泽塔姐妹
房子保住了

translation.en: And Oliver and I started dating again.
translation.zh: 奥利佛和我又开始约会了

translation.en: Oliver is kind and sweet and when we kiss,
translation.zh: 奥利佛很和善甜蜜 而且当我们亲吻时

translation.en: I see stars and he sees fireworks.
translation.zh: 我看到了星星 他看到了焰火

translation.en: And he says that means we're in love, and he's right!
translation.zh:
他说 这意味着我们相爱了
他说得对！

translation.en: Otherwise, when we kiss we'd see pencils and empty ketchup bottles.
translation.zh:
要不然 当我们亲吻时 我们会看到铅笔
